hero.headline: How to Pin Comments on YouTube
hero.subheadline: Highlight important comments and drive engagement with pinned comments.

sections.content: Pinned comments stick to the top of your comment section. They're visible to every viewer who scrolls down. Use them strategically to add context, ask questions, or highlight community responses. Here's how to pin comments and use them effectively.

faq.question: Can I pin my own comment?
faq.answer: Yes. Most creators pin their own comments. Write your comment, then pin it. Great for questions or added context.

faq.question: How many comments can I pin?
faq.answer: Only one per video. Pinning a new comment unpins the previous one. Choose strategically.

faq.question: Do pinned comments affect algorithm?
faq.answer: Indirectly. They can increase engagement (more replies), which signals active content. But pinning itself isn't a ranking factor.

faq.question: Should I always have a pinned comment?
faq.answer: Not required. But it's an opportunity. Even a simple question can boost engagement significantly.
